job_listings.title: Senior Software Engineer
job_listings.description: We are looking for a senior software engineer with experience in Python and React.
job_listings.requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development. Strong knowledge of Python, React, and cloud technologies.

job_listings.title: Product Manager
job_listings.description: Join our product team to lead the development of innovative solutions for women in tech.
job_listings.requirements: 3+ years of product management experience. Experience with agile methodologies and user-centered design.

job_listings.title: UX Designer
job_listings.description: Design user experiences for our flagship products focused on women's career development.
job_listings.requirements: Portfolio demonstrating UX design skills. Experience with Figma and user research.

events.title: Women in Tech Conference
events.description: Annual conference celebrating women's achievements in technology and providing networking opportunities.

events.title: Resume Building Workshop
events.description: Learn how to create an impactful resume that highlights your skills and experiences.

events.title: Leadership Skills Webinar
events.description: Develop essential leadership skills to advance your career in any industry.

mentorship_programs.title: Tech Leadership Mentorship
mentorship_programs.description: One-on-one mentorship program focused on developing leadership skills for women in technology roles.
mentorship_programs.mentor_bio: Priya is a CTO with 15 years of experience in the tech industry. She has led teams at major tech companies and startups.
mentorship_programs.mentor_expertise: Technology Leadership, Career Development, Team Management

mentorship_programs.title: Product Management Essentials
mentorship_programs.description: Learn the fundamentals of product management from experienced product leaders.
mentorship_programs.mentor_bio: Anjali has been a product manager for 10 years, working on consumer and enterprise products at leading tech companies.
mentorship_programs.mentor_expertise: Product Strategy, User Research, Roadmap Planning

mentorship_programs.title: Career Transition to Tech
mentorship_programs.description: Guidance for women looking to transition their careers into the technology sector.
mentorship_programs.mentor_bio: Meera successfully transitioned from marketing to software engineering and now helps others make similar career changes.
mentorship_programs.mentor_expertise: Career Transition, Skill Development, Job Search Strategy
